Dear XXX
I hope this email finds you well. Thank you for your interest in the Platinum Wholesale Program!
How do you become Platinum Partner?
You can qualify to become a Platinum Partner after spending $3,000 within 365 days which makes you eligible for the 3-Star Level. Your current purchase total is $ XXX .
What is Platinum Partners?
The Platinum program offers discounts to high purchase volume customers when purchases meet a set level. You discount level is determined by your previous 365-day purchases.
Once you have qualified, the program period runs from July 1st of the current year until June 30th of the following year. We look at accounts on a daily basis. When you are within $1,000 from qualifying, we will reach out to you to give you the great news!
What are the levels of discount?
The 3-Star Program: Purchase $3,000 in products within the 12-month time frame and you will receive a 5% discount off the lowest advertise price on all orders.
The 4-Star Program: Purchase $5,000 in products within the 12-month time frame and you will receive a 10% discount off the lowest advertise price on all orders.
The 5-Star Program: Purchase $10,000 in products within the 12-month time frame and you will receive a 15% discount off the lowest advertise price on all orders.
What are the benefits of Platinum?
1. A knowledgeable team of dedicated Platinum partner Representatives available to assist you through your member’s only exclusive phone line.
2. Platinum Partner’s Exclusive emails, featuring new product previews, savings on closeout items and more.
3. Expedited order processing- Platinum orders move to the front of the line for daily order processing.
4. Online Order History- For quick reorder and convenience, log into your online account and view your order history for the past 18 months.
5. 24/7 Online Ordering- Log in to your personal Fire Mountain Gems and Beads account to take advantage of your exclusive discount.
6. Extended Return Policy – an additional 90 days to return unaltered product
Please feel free to contact me with any questions.
